New Records: Gerrit Cole has tied Greg Maddux and Curt Schilling for 7th on the MLB all-time Playoffs pitcher wins list with 11.
Key Match Events: Aaron Judge makes catch to secure final out, helping Yankees eliminate Royals and advance to ALCS
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees needed to win by 2 runs or more to cover the spread and they did cover, so people who took the Yankees won.
The over/under was 8 and the teams scored 4 runs, so people who bet the under won
The Yankees won at -154 odds so a bet of $154 won $254 total
The Yankees return to ALCS with 3-1 win over Royals behind Gerrit Cole's gem
Others: Gerrit Cole held the Royals to a single run over seven innings Thursday night, sending the Yankees to a 3-1 victory that put them back to the ALCS.
Tommy Pham has reached 30 singles in his playoffs career.
Juan Soto has reached 20 singles in his playoffs career.
Aaron Judge has reached 30 walks in his playoffs career.
Gleyber Torres has reached 20 runs batted in in his playoffs career.
